originalText.text: I wish I could leave zero stars HORRIBLE HORRIBLEEEEEEEEE SAVE YOUR TIME AND MONEY kept me there for two hours for a basic gel mani and filed my nail down to the mail bed it hurts so bad. My nails look horrific and they hurt.

originalText.text: Iâ€™ve been here once before and was happy with the service. My daughter has also used them for four years. Iâ€™m visiting from Australia. I was pushed services, even after declining, without understanding what I was being sold or the additional cost, when Iâ€™d made it very clear what I wanted. The gel Pedi was excellent, however, powder dipped nails are rough, misshaped, already lifting and need repairing. The rude and disrespectful manner in which the manager spoke to the technicians combined with a clear financial exploitation means neither I or my daughter will ever return. The only reason I have one star was because of the pedi. For over $300 I would have at least expected a glass of water!

originalText.text: Itâ€™s hard to even justify giving this place 1 star. We came in asking if they did gel tips and they said yes however it was extremely clear that they didnâ€™t. Halfway through the mani we made them stop as it wasnâ€™t the gel we had requested and they continued to lie and say that this is the â€˜newâ€™ gel. The woman didnâ€™t have a clue how to do my nails and even accidentally cut me to the point of bleeding and got the polish on my skin. After all this, and many complaints, they still made us pay $80. Absolute daylight robbery. Could have done a better job of it myself at home so Iâ€™d save the wasted journey here!!

originalText.text: Appears very clean with large assortment of nail polishes, however my technician could use additional training. She painted my gel nails with large gaps between the nail and cuticle so it appears grown out. I tried to point this out but she told me the third coat would cover this. I think it would create an uneven color. The owner or manager did not help/correct the situation. Cost $41
